rooms.name: Dark Forest Clearing
rooms.description: You are standing in a small clearing in a dark forest. To the north, you see a faint light.

rooms.name: Stone Hallway
rooms.description: You are in a cold stone hallway. The forest is to the south. To the east is a heavy wooden door.

rooms.name: Treasure Room
rooms.description: You are in a glittering room filled with riches!

items.name: Gold Bar
items.description: A heavy bar of solid gold.
